articles.title: Bank of England raises interests, diverging from other central banks - Reuters
articles.description: Britain became the first G7 economy to hike interest rates since the onset of the pandemic on Thursday, with the U.S. Federal Reserve also signalling plans to tighten in 2022 but the European Central Bank only slightly reining in stimulus.
articles.content: Dec 16 (Reuters) - Britain became the first G7 economy to hike interest rates since the onset of the pandemic on Thursday, with the U.S. Federal Reserve also signalling plans to tighten in 2022 but t… [+5079 chars]

articles.title: EU leaders weigh new sanctions on Russia amid 'series of attacks' - Reuters
articles.description: The European Union is under assault from Russia on multiple fronts and must unite behind new economic sanctions, Baltic and central European leaders said on Thursday, with Lithuania citing a risk of possible Russian military strikes from Belarus.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, Dec 16 (Reuters) - The European Union is under assault from Russia on multiple fronts and must unite behind new economic sanctions, Baltic and central European leaders said on Thursday, wit… [+4075 chars]
